```{r}

```

```{r}
df = do.call(
  rbind,
  lapply(
    c(#"prior",
      "l0",
      #"l0_shifted_0.1", "l0_shifted_0.5",
      #"l0_shifted_1",
      "l0_shifted_2", "l0_shifted_5"),
    function(dist_label) {
      fromJSON(paste("../models/minimal_inductive/", dist_label, ".json", sep="")) %>%
        as.data.frame() %>%
        mutate(dist=dist_label)}))
```

```{r, fig.width=4, fig.height=1.5}
df %>%
  # filter(dist %in% c("l0", "l0_shifted_0.1")) %>%
  erin_ggplot(aes(x=support, y=probs, fill=dist, colour=dist)) +
  erin_geom_bar() +
  facet_wrap(~dist) +
  ggtitle("a less expensive watch")
```
